sentence.Network_en: Howsoever you look at the great Cathedral, it is noble, it is beautiful!
sentence.Network_cn: 无论你怎么看, 这座了不起的大教堂总是显得雄伟, 总是显得美丽!

sentence.Network_en: The Carrier shall be exonerated from all liability for any loss, damage, injury howsoever caused.
sentence.Network_cn: 承运人应免除由此引起的任何损失 、 损坏 、 伤害的全部责任.

sentence.Network_en: He was not invited by us, howsoever he came to the party.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然我们谁也没有邀请他参加我们的聚会, 但他还是来了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(66) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... howling 嚎叫 howsoever 不管如何 hoy 嗬！.

auth_sentence.content: Further, they pressed, had he not made his way in the world, and might not a son of his, howsoever constructed, do likewise?
auth_sentence.res_content: Further, they pressed, had he not made his way in the world, and might not a son of his, howsoever constructed, do likewise?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Further, they pressed, had he not made his way in the world, and might not a son of his, howsoever constructed, do likewise?
